errorMessages.E_MSG_FPATH_TYP: "A Type-Error has occured! The filepath agrument passed into class TextDocument's constructor is of an 'INVALID TYPE'. The file path must be a string in a typical filepath format, furthermore; the filepath must be the filepath of a plain-text document that end with a (.txt) extention. Exmp.('./sumfile.txt')"
errorMessages.E_MSG_FPATH_FTYP: "A Syntax-Error has occured! The filepath agrument passed into class TextDocument's constructor is an invalid file-type. Class TextDocument only accepts plain-text files that end in a '.txt' extention. If you feel that you did pass a plain-text file into the constructor, check to make sure that the path is properly formatted, you also need to ensure that the filename has the '.txt' extention, without it you will recieve this error."
errorMessages.E_MSG_TXDOC_MAXBYT:
[!ERROR, OUT OF RANGE!]: The file passed into class TextDocument, via the constructors filepath parameter, exceeds the 'Maximum File-Size' allowed. In response to the preformance issues that occur when handling several MBs of text in a single document, the TextDocument class enforces a (2MB/1024k) limit (2097152-BYTES). Though the limit is set at (2.5MB), it is advised that text files be kept below (1.125MB), or (1179648-BYTES)."


 * (NOTE: "(1.25MB/1024k) is equivalant to an average of 600-680 pages of text that average 1848 - 2248 chars per page.")
